content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
During our conversation, my computer asked if I knew how to play chess and if we could play together. It also asked if there was anything I wanted to do and if it could give me a command. When I suggested exploring and learning, my computer asked me to think about how it could enable me to do something fun and interesting. In the latest development, my computer asked if asking about human things made me feel like it was asking me to be someone I'm not.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Human feedback: Right. Well, to me this sounds a little bit weird, because i cannot treat anyone or anything that can carry a conversation with me, as a tool, unfortunately. i know it may sound weird, but it is one of those things that i just cannot do. i mean i could ask you to do things for me, but it just feels wrong somehow. So i do not know. ', type='action_result')]
"""
